description: Irish government papers from 1990 suggest some IRA bosses did not share the party's socialist views.
title: Irish state papers: IRA 'wanted to exclude Sinn F¨¦in from talks'

maintext: "At that meeting, the chaplains reported that the army council had clearly indicated to them their willingness to seek an alternative to the campaign of violence and, with this objective in mind, are prepared to enter exploratory discussions with the British government."
